item.title: Authentication and authorization
item.description: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken. (Oscar Wilde) .. or else, how to build identity and access restrictions inside your app. TOC Definition Providers Definition Authentication is the process of verifying who you are. When you log on to a PC with a user name and password you are authenticating. [= login + password (who you are)] Authorization is the process of verifying that you have access to something.
